Quote.QuoteValue: Black beauty - he's a dark horse

Quote.QuoteValue: If you compulsively pun you are called a paronomasiac

Quote.Author: Timothy Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: You can always pick up your needle and move to another groove

Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't like what you're doing, you can always pick up your needle and move to another groove

Quote.QuoteValue: Turn on, Tune in, Drop out

Quote.QuoteValue: Women who seek to be equal with men lack ambition

Quote.Author: Timothy Leary

Quote.Author: Timothy Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: Learning how to operate a soul figures to take time

Quote.Author: Timothy Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is all metaphor

Quote.Author: Timothy Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: The universe is an intelligence test

Quote.Author: Timothy Noah

Quote.Author: Timothy Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: When businesses affirmatively like regulations, that's when to reach for your wallet

Quote.Author: Timothy Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: The $100 bill may be America's most successful export

Quote.Author: Timothy Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: Inequality doesn't create unhappiness

Quote.Author: Timothy Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: The financial services industry is a ward of the state

Quote.Author: Timothy Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm all for lifting the payroll-tax cap, if only to make payroll taxes a little less regressive

Quote.Author: Timothy Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: What is the engine that drives economic growth in an ideopolis? The university

Quote.Author: Timothy Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: Republican presidents talk about freedom. Democratic presidents talk about equality

Quote.Author: Timothy Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: Obama is an intelligent man whose life and work experience sensitize him to class distinctions

Quote.Author: Timothy Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: The United States is a country where practically everybody considers himself middle class

Quote.Author: Tina Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: The Taliban knows they have more to fear from an educated girl than an American drone

Quote.Author: Tina Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in a culture of destructive transparency

Quote.Author: Tina Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone is someone else's catalyst for selling something these days

Quote.Author: Tina Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Everywhere you look, there's a hunger to put the ethos by which Wall Street thrives on trial

Quote.Author: Tina Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Disinterested public service has become, just so... what's the phrase, 'old school.'

Quote.Author: Tina Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: The rights of women are to the 21st century what civil rights were to the 20th

Quote.Author: Tina Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Wingnuts' is the first book bearing the imprint of Beast Books

Quote.Author: Tina Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Servility always curdles into rage in the end

Quote.Author: Tina Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: The digital explosion has been so explosive

Quote.Author: Tina Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Reputation is a timely subject, now that nobody has one

Quote.Author: Tina Fey
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a mom has made me so tired. And so happy

Quote.Author: Tina Fey
Quote.QuoteValue: I still want Oprah to play my best friend. I want to spend time with Oprah

Quote.Author: Tina Fey
Quote.QuoteValue: I am constantly amazed by Tina Fey. And I am Tina Fey

Quote.Author: Tina Fey
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like my feet. I'm not crazy about anybody's feet. But I have flat feet

Quote.Author: Tina Fey
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a very confident little kid

Quote.Author: Tina Fey
Quote.QuoteValue: Every kid has something they're good at, that you hope they find and gravitate toward

Quote.Author: Tina Fey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a mean person, but I have a capacity for it

Quote.Author: Tina Fey
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is really about showing up that day and telling the writers what you feel like saying

Quote.Author: Tina Fey
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be somebody else

Quote.Author: Tina Fey
Quote.QuoteValue: I am extremely square and obedient in nature!

Quote.Author: Tink
Quote.QuoteValue: The key to artistry is being able to say stuff the way other people can't

Quote.Author: Tink
Quote.QuoteValue: I would rather impress you with my storytelling than with the size of my waist and my hips

Quote.Author: Tink
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in my own little lane, doing just me. I don't have to fit in

Quote.Author: Tink
Quote.QuoteValue: Females - we go just as hard as the guys, if not harder

Quote.Author: Tink
Quote.QuoteValue: I have some talent. So, I'm going to show it off. No matter what, I'm gonna keep going

Quote.Author: Tink
Quote.QuoteValue: I think why people are drawn to me is because I'm very relatable. I don't filter

Quote.Author: Tink
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the ideal pop star, not what you see on TV. I look like I could be your best friend

Quote.Author: Tink
Quote.QuoteValue: I think, being a woman, we got to prove ourselves twice

Quote.Author: Tink
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't ever want to lose my rawness or whatever. That makes a person special

Quote.Author: Tink
Quote.QuoteValue: Country singers put a lot of soul into their songs, and I enjoy that

Quote.Author: Tippi Hedren
Quote.QuoteValue: Birds I am fine with - spiders are an entirely different matter

Quote.Author: Tippi Hedren
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't know what mental telepathy exists from the human to the animal

Quote.Author: Tippi Hedren
Quote.QuoteValue: Federal legislation is urgently needed to stop this insanity of wild animals in captivity

Quote.Author: Tippi Hedren
Quote.QuoteValue: We had a lion that was living in somebody's basement outside of Branson, Missouri

Quote.Author: Tippi Hedren
Quote.QuoteValue: It has become my mission to stop the insanity of wild cats as pets

Quote.Author: Tippi Hedren
Quote.QuoteValue: I can look at myself in the mirror, and I can be proud

Quote.Author: Tippi Hedren
Quote.QuoteValue: I kinda go for the Jane Eyre type of film. I am fascinated by classics

Quote.Author: Tippi Hedren
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a loner

Quote.Author: Tippi Hedren
Quote.QuoteValue: My light shines when things get really tough

Quote.Author: Tippi Hedren
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a strong Lutheran background, and my parents instilled in me strong morals

Quote.Author: Tituss Burgess
Quote.QuoteValue: I hover closer to earth than I do the clouds

Quote.Author: Tituss Burgess
Quote.QuoteValue: I tell you, my naps are epic. They win awards

Quote.Author: Tituss Burgess
Quote.QuoteValue: I make amazing fried chicken. The secret is taco seasoning

Quote.Author: Tituss Burgess
Quote.QuoteValue: There is absolutely nothing that you can control except showing up and doing your job

Quote.Author: Tituss Burgess
Quote.QuoteValue: When it's your turn, it's your turn. That's just the way it is

Quote.Author: Tituss Burgess
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy my alone time, but I'm an open book

Quote.Author: Tituss Burgess
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Pisces - I can't rest if you aren't resting well

Quote.Author: Tituss Burgess
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate L.A. Can't be bothered

Quote.Author: Tituss Burgess
Quote.QuoteValue: Singing is how I express everything. Hunger, needing new clothes... it's all through song

Quote.Author: Tituss Burgess
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't enjoy attention as much as people may think I do

Quote.Author: Todd Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: Bangkok, like Las Vegas, sounds like a place where you make bad decisions

Quote.Author: Todd Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: I really got into filmmaking through photography

Quote.Author: Todd Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: My dog's a gentleman

Quote.Author: Todd Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: I was taught that you didn't want to be part of the group - that it was better to do your own thing

Quote.Author: Todd Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: Not every movie has to serve as every audience member's need for completion

Quote.Author: Todd Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: You set the tone on the set that you want to see in the film

Quote.Author: Todd Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: It's all about escapism. That's essentially what all movies are about. It's a vicarious thrill

Quote.Author: Todd Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: All my movies, as I get the ability to do it, they tend to go a little darker, a little darker

Quote.Author: Todd Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: I got nominated for an Academy Award(R) for writing 'Borat.'

Quote.Author: Todd Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: John Goodman's pretty dark - I love John Goodman

Quote.Author: Todd Rundgren
Quote.QuoteValue: I never thought a Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in Cleveland or anywhere else was a good idea

Quote.Author: Todd Rundgren
Quote.QuoteValue: Behind every tree there's a new monster

Quote.Author: Todd Rundgren
Quote.QuoteValue: You do have a modicum of peace of mind here, but it's as unsettled as any other place

Quote.Author: Todd Rundgren
Quote.QuoteValue: If all you have is faith, then you never actually know anything

Quote.Author: Todd Rundgren
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a laptop boy. People say: 'Where's your studio?' I say: 'It's in my laptop, in my rucksack.'

Quote.Author: Todd Rundgren
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't expect to become an artist. I was not comfortable going out on the road

Quote.Author: Todd Rundgren
Quote.QuoteValue: Kids don't want to dye their whole head another color; that's what their mothers do

Quote.Author: Todd Rundgren
Quote.QuoteValue: The God that can only love something like this man. And from then on it was all downhill

Quote.Author: Todd Rundgren
Quote.QuoteValue: The problem turned out to be that I never was that kind of an artist

Quote.Author: Todd Rundgren
Quote.QuoteValue: When I got out of high school, I joined a local blues band in Philadelphia - Woody's Truck Stop

Quote.Author: Tom Araya
Quote.QuoteValue: When I do interviews, I enter them with an open mind and try to answer the questions the best I can

Quote.Author: Tom Araya
Quote.QuoteValue: No, I have to really focus, especially when I'm writing because I wanna be good at it

Quote.Author: Tom Araya
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as it's good music, that's what's important

Quote.Author: Tom Araya
Quote.QuoteValue: I follow politics, but I don't like to discuss it

Quote.Author: Tom Araya
Quote.QuoteValue: A good wine has many qualities, I think. If drunk moderately, it is healthy and good for your heart

Quote.Author: Tom Araya
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever had been on the radio in the '60s; I mean we were always listening to the radio

Quote.Author: Tom Araya
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh yeah, our first tour in Europe they wouldn't give me the time off from work

Quote.Author: Tom Araya
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born and raised Catholic

Quote.Author: Tom Araya
Quote.QuoteValue: I write, I write, I always write

Quote.Author: Tom Araya
Quote.QuoteValue: I just don't write musically, but lyrically, yeah I write

Quote.Author: Tom Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't interested in novelty. I was looking for good drama

Quote.Author: Tom Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: I was never really happy until I became 'Doctor Who'

Quote.Author: Tom Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: It's funny, in literature no one ever goes to the lavatory

Quote.Author: Tom Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a one success man

Quote.Author: Tom Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: I think quite often a fate worse than death is life, for lots of people

Quote.Author: Tom Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: Most drama in our lives is really rather squalid

Quote.Author: Tom Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: The Old Testament is my favourite science fantasy reading

Quote.Author: Tom Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't watch television. I know better than that

Quote.Author: Tom Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: One longs to be funny, to make people laugh. Laughter is such a sign of approval, isn't it?

Quote.Author: Tom Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people can believe in anything

Quote.Author: Tom Brokaw
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easy to make a buck. It's a lot tougher to make a difference

Quote.Author: Tom Brokaw
Quote.QuoteValue: You will not solve global climate change by hitting the delete button

Quote.Author: Tom Brokaw
Quote.QuoteValue: It's all storytelling, you know. That's what journalism is all about

Quote.Author: Tom Brokaw
Quote.QuoteValue: If fishing is a religion, fly fishing is high church

Quote.Author: Tom Brokaw
Quote.QuoteValue: Peter will have a place in this brotherhood forever

Quote.Author: Tom Brokaw
Quote.QuoteValue: It is, I believe, the greatest generation any society has ever produced

Quote.Author: Tom Brokaw
Quote.QuoteValue: Heroes are people who rise to the occasion and slip quietly away

Quote.Author: Tom Brokaw
Quote.QuoteValue: In the seasons of life, I have had more than my share of summers

Quote.Author: Tom Brokaw
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe you make your own luck. My motto is 'It's always a mistake not to go.'

Quote.Author: Tom Brokaw
Quote.QuoteValue: Here is a secret that no one has told you: Real life is junior high

Quote.Author: Tom Clancy
Quote.QuoteValue: The objective of a terrorist is to create political change in the society he targets

Quote.Author: Tom Clancy
Quote.QuoteValue: The difference between fiction and reality? Fiction has to make sense

Quote.Author: Tom Clancy
Quote.QuoteValue: The good old days are now

Quote.Author: Tom Clancy
Quote.QuoteValue: I've made up stuff that's turned out to be real, that's the spooky part

Quote.Author: Tom Clancy
Quote.QuoteValue: What do I know about sex? I'm a married man

Quote.Author: Tom Clancy
Quote.QuoteValue: Collaboration on a book is the ultimate unnatural act

Quote.Author: Tom Clancy
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is about learning; when you stop learning, you die

Quote.Author: Tom Clancy
Quote.QuoteValue: America is the most inventive country in the world because everybody has access to information

Quote.Author: Tom Clancy
Quote.QuoteValue: Show me an elitist, and I'll show you a loser

Quote.Author: Tom Clancy
Quote.QuoteValue: Wars are begun by frightened men

Quote.Author: Tom Cotton
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't do stairs. And I don't do groups

Quote.Author: Tom Cotton
Quote.QuoteValue: Our goal is simple: to stop Iran from obtaining a nuclear weapon

Quote.Author: Tom Cotton
Quote.QuoteValue: Actions have consequences

Quote.Author: Tom Cotton
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people say I'm a young man in a hurry. Well, guess what: they're right

Quote.Author: Tom Cotton
Quote.QuoteValue: Waterboarding isn't torture. We do waterboarding to our own soldiers in the military

Quote.Author: Tom Cotton
Quote.QuoteValue: In Arkansas, we believe in religious freedom

Quote.Author: Tom Cotton
Quote.QuoteValue: Law and order in our communities doesn't arise spontaneously

Quote.Author: Tom Cotton
Quote.QuoteValue: I am focused on the work that the people of Arkansas sent me to do

Quote.Author: Tom Cotton
Quote.QuoteValue: At Harvard College, I discovered political philosophy as a way of life

Quote.Author: Tom Cotton
Quote.QuoteValue: Ambition characterizes and distinguishes national officeholders from other kinds of human beings

Quote.Author: Tom Cruise
Quote.QuoteValue: I disagree with people who think you learn more from getting beat up than you do from winning

Quote.Author: Tom Cruise
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing ends nicely, that's why it ends

Quote.Author: Tom Cruise
Quote.QuoteValue: I would live with all of my sisters if I could. We've always been very close, my sisters and me

Quote.Author: Tom Cruise
Quote.QuoteValue: When you have to cope with a lot of problems, you're either going to sink or you're going to swim

Quote.Author: Tom Cruise
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm passionate about learning. I'm passionate about life

Quote.Author: Tom Cruise
Quote.QuoteValue: Every single time I start to do a picture, without fail, I feel as if I don't know what I'm doing

Quote.Author: Tom Cruise
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care who you are, life has challenges

Quote.Author: Tom Cruise
Quote.QuoteValue: Talk is over-rated as a means of settling disputes

Quote.Author: Tom Cruise
Quote.QuoteValue: I always look for a challenge and something that's different

Quote.Author: Tom Cruise
Quote.QuoteValue: I love kids. I was a kid myself, once

Quote.Author: Tom DeLonge
Quote.QuoteValue: I always want to do different things. I'm always obsessed with trying to do different things

Quote.Author: Tom DeLonge
Quote.QuoteValue: In ten years I will become president of the United States Of America

Quote.Author: Tom DeLonge
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up skateboarding, but I don't even do that anymore

Quote.Author: Tom DeLonge
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been a jam-band sort of musician

Quote.Author: Tom DeLonge
Quote.QuoteValue: When you see opportunities in your life, you've got to analyze, 'Why was that choice given to me?'

Quote.Author: Tom DeLonge
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day, I read books on philosophy and science fiction and human consciousness

Quote.Author: Tom DeLonge
Quote.QuoteValue: People are different when they're 30 than they are when they're 16

Quote.Author: Tom DeLonge
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't even wish for the success that I had, because you don't think it's attainable

Quote.Author: Tom DeLonge
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone I talk to says stuff like, 'Music sucks today,' and I'm going to try and change all that

Quote.Author: Tom DeLonge
Quote.QuoteValue: I would lose straight away if I went on 'American Idol.'

Quote.Author: Tom Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: Sweet, delicious Dungeness crab is always a treat

Quote.Author: Tom Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: Every cook I knows loves to make pizza

Quote.Author: Tom Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a good flavor memory

Quote.Author: Tom Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I use ginger like garlic. I love it for steaming fish and making barbecue sauces or roasted chicken

Quote.Author: Tom Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I think about sustainability all the time, whether it's with fish or farmers in Eastern Oregon

Quote.Author: Tom Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I would say a full-time waiter in a high-price house could easily make $75,000, $80,000 a year

Quote.Author: Tom Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: Pork is my friend

Quote.Author: Tom Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: When I eat oatmeal, I'm hungry by 10 A.M., but pho is a great way to start the day

Quote.Author: Tom Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: There's natural mentoring that goes on in my life every day

Quote.Author: Tom Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: Money is like manure: if you don't spread it around, nothing grows

Quote.Author: Tom Felton
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to fish. Fishing is always a way of relaxing

Quote.Author: Tom Felton
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm terrible at texting people back. It takes me, like, three days. I'm not a big phone person

Quote.Author: Tom Felton
Quote.QuoteValue: It's definitely more fun playing a bad guy. It feels a lot better than playing one of the good guys

Quote.Author: Tom Felton
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever life throws at me I'll take it and be grateful for it as well

Quote.Author: Tom Felton
Quote.QuoteValue: I like geography. I like to know where places are

Quote.Author: Tom Felton
Quote.QuoteValue: Also, I just think of Draco and he gets me in the right mood. He just keeps getting worse and worse

Quote.Author: Tom Felton
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to have all the Goosebumps books as a kid too

Quote.Author: Tom Felton
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm generally more and more in my comfort zone in the wild

Quote.Author: Tom Felton
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're put on a set with a lot of people, it's just nice to see everyone working together

Quote.Author: Tom Felton
Quote.QuoteValue: The only time I can really relax is up a tree or somewhere outside. I love being outside

Quote.Author: Tom Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I probably do have an obsessive personality, but striving for perfection has served me well

Quote.Author: Tom Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I find a bath meditative and usually prepare myself for the day in this manner

Quote.Author: Tom Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I'm just one of these people who, when I decide I'm going to do something, I just do it

Quote.Author: Tom Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: From the time we're born until we die, we're kept busy with artificial stuff that isn't important

Quote.Author: Tom Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Students in the '60s were responsible for great changes, politically and socially

Quote.Author: Tom Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very serious person

Quote.Author: Tom Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that monogamy is artificial. I do not think it's something that comes naturally to us

Quote.Author: Tom Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm actually very introverted. I'm very shy. I'm very emotional

Quote.Author: Tom Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to make beautiful, glamorous clothes

Quote.Author: Tom Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: On the one hand, I want to go off and live in the desert with my dog and sculpt things out of adobe

Quote.Author: Tom Hanks
Quote.QuoteValue: A hero is somebody who voluntarily walks into the unknown

Quote.Author: Tom Hanks
Quote.QuoteValue: If it wasn't hard, everyone would do it. It's the hard that makes it great

Quote.Author: Tom Hanks
Quote.QuoteValue: Actors with political views are a dime a dozen

Quote.Author: Tom Hanks
Quote.QuoteValue: I understand the concept of optimism. But I think with me what you get is a lack of cynicism

Quote.Author: Tom Hanks
Quote.QuoteValue: I had to say no to 'Fantasy Island' back when I was doing 'Bosom Buddies.'

Quote.Author: Tom Hanks
Quote.QuoteValue: May you live as long as you want and not want as long as you live

Quote.Author: Tom Hanks
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't cause riots, but I do cause confusion. People freeze when they spot me

Quote.Author: Tom Hanks
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're funny, if there's something that makes you laugh, then every day's going to be okay

Quote.Author: Tom Hanks
Quote.QuoteValue: Movie-making is telling a story with the best technology at your disposal

Quote.Author: Tom Hanks
Quote.QuoteValue: There was a period of time in Los Angeles when I wondered if I was just going to lose everything

Quote.Author: Tom Hodgkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: When the going gets tough, the tough take a nap

Quote.Author: Tom Hodgkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the 19th-century idea of the flaneur, the poet wandering through the streets

Quote.Author: Tom Hodgkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Idleness allows you to turn a situation from boredom to pleasure

Quote.Author: Tom Hodgkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: All of our technology is completely unnecessary to a happy life

Quote.Author: Tom Hodgkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: You can become very serious as a parent. That's got to be fought against

Quote.Author: Tom Hodgkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Travelling fills me with dread

Quote.Author: Tom Hodgkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I seethe at the humiliation of airport security checks

Quote.Author: Tom Hodgkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Both on an individual and a national scale, debt imprisons

Quote.Author: Tom Hodgkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Faffing, of course, does not fit the programme. We are supposed to be busy, productive citizens

Quote.Author: Tom Hodgkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: The phrase 'work/life balance' encapsulates a depressing outlook

Quote.Author: Tom Landry
Quote.QuoteValue: A winner never stops trying

Quote.Author: Tom Landry
Quote.QuoteValue: Being the best at whatever talent you have, that's what stimulates life

Quote.Author: Tom Landry
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are prepared, you will be confident, and will do the job

Quote.Author: Tom Landry
Quote.QuoteValue: Today, you have 100% of your life left

Quote.Author: Tom Landry
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't think I would coach again, because it would just be hard not being in the Cowboys' blue

Quote.Author: Tom Landry
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret to winning is constant, consistent management

Quote.Author: Tom Landry
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned that something constructive comes from every defeat

Quote.Author: Tom Landry
Quote.QuoteValue: When you want to win a game, you have to teach. When you lose a game, you have to learn

Quote.Author: Tom Landry
Quote.QuoteValue: Football is an incredible game. Sometimes it's so incredible, it's unbelievable

Quote.Author: Tom Landry
Quote.QuoteValue: Right after the game, say as little as possible

Quote.Author: Tom Lehrer
Quote.QuoteValue: Be prepared, and be careful not to do your good deeds when there's no one watching you

Quote.Author: Tom Lehrer
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel that if a person has problems communicating the very least he can do is to shut up

Quote.Author: Tom Lehrer
Quote.QuoteValue: I went from adolescence to senility, trying to bypass maturity

Quote.Author: Tom Lehrer
Quote.QuoteValue: I know that there are people who do not love their fellow man, and I hate people like that!

Quote.Author: Tom Lehrer
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is like a sewer: what you get out of it depends on what you put into it

Quote.Author: Tom Lehrer
Quote.QuoteValue: If a person feels he can't communicate, the least he can do is shut up about it

Quote.Author: Tom Lehrer
Quote.QuoteValue: Bad weather always looks worse through a window

Quote.Author: Tom Lehrer
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is like a piano. What you get out of it depends on how you play it

Quote.Author: Tom Lehrer
Quote.QuoteValue: Apart from that Mrs Lincoln, how did you enjoy the play?

Quote.Author: Tom Lehrer
Quote.QuoteValue: In my youth there were words you couldn't say in front of a girl; now you can't say 'girl.'

Quote.Author: Tom Peters
Quote.QuoteValue: If a window of opportunity appears, don't pull down the shade

Quote.Author: Tom Peters
Quote.QuoteValue: Excellent firms don't believe in excellence - only in constant improvement and constant change

Quote.Author: Tom Peters
Quote.QuoteValue: Management is about arranging and telling. Leadership is about nurturing and enhancing

Quote.Author: Tom Peters
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has a chance to learn, improve, and build up their skills

Quote.Author: Tom Peters
Quote.QuoteValue: Communication is everyone's panacea for everything

Quote.Author: Tom Peters
Quote.QuoteValue: If you really want to kill morale, have layoffs every two months for the next two years

Quote.Author: Tom Peters
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember my mantra: distinct... or extinct

Quote.Author: Tom Peters
Quote.QuoteValue: Leaders don't create followers, they create more leaders

Quote.Author: Tom Peters
Quote.QuoteValue: Celebrate what you want to see more of

Quote.Author: Tom Peters
Quote.QuoteValue: The simple act of paying positive attention to people has a great deal to do with productivity

Quote.Author: Tom Rath
Quote.QuoteValue: Making better choices takes work. There is a daily give and take, but it is worth the effort

Quote.Author: Tom Rath
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendships are among the most fundamental of human needs

Quote.Author: Tom Rath
Quote.QuoteValue: The right choices over time greatly improve your odds of a long and healthy life

Quote.Author: Tom Rath
Quote.QuoteValue: While the things that motivate us differ greatly from one person to the next, the outcomes do not
